msItem.incipit: [1v1] || yaḥ śrīmān sugato buddhaḥ saddharmmadeśako jinaḥ | śāsanāni trilokeṣu jayantu [1v2] tasya sarvvadā || purāśīt pātalīputre nagare svarggasannibhe | aśokanṛparājendras triratnasevakaḥ su¦[1v3]dhī || ekasmin samaye tatra sa rājā svajanaiḥ saha | paurikaiś ca sabhāṃ kṛtvā tasthau dharmmasamutsukaḥ || a[1v4]thā'sau sauto3ga2 bhigukṣur upagupto jināṃśajaḥ || lokān dharmmotsukān dṛṣṭvā samādheḥ sahasotthitaḥ || ¦ [1v5] tatsabhāyāṃ samuttīrya siṃhāsane subhāsane | bhāsayan tatsabhā lokān tasthau pūrṇṇaśudhāṃśuvat_ || athāśo¦[1v6]ko mahārājas sāmātyapaurikais saha | pūjāṃgeḥ pūjayitvā tam upaguptam avaṃdataḥ || sthitvā bhūmau ca jānu[1v7]bhyām uttarāsaṃgam udvahan_ | kṛtāṃjalipuṭo natvā punar evam abhāṣata | bhadanta pātum icchāmi dharmmāmṛtaṃ 4sukhapradaṃ | [1v8] yad uktaṃ śrīmunīndreṇa tat samādeṣṭum arhasi || iti tena mahīndreṇa prārthi 'sau yatīśvaraḥ | upaguptaḥ sa¦[1v9]māmantrya tan nṛpeśaṃ samabravīt_ || sādhu sādhu mahārāja śṛṇu dharmmasamāhitaḥ | yathākhyā me guruṇā ¦ [1v10] khyātaṃ tathā bhāṣe hite tava || purā'sau bhagavān buddhaḥ śākyasiṃho dayānidhiḥ | dharmmarājo jagacchāstā [1v9] sarvajñaḥ sugato jinaḥ ||

msItem.explicit: [6v7 = 107v7] athāśoko mahīpālaḥ [6v8 = 107v8] śrotum anyat subhāṣitaṃ | upaguptaguruṃ natvā kṛtāñjalipuṭo 'bravīt_ || bhadanta śrotum icchāmi [6v9 = 107v9] punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ | tad yathā guruṇākhyātaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ tvam arhasi || iti tenārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā [6v10 = 107v10] sasugatāṃśaṃ | upagupto narendran taṃ samāmantryaivam abravīt_ | śṛṇu rājan mayābhāga yathā me guruṇo[7r1 = 108r1]ditaṃ | tathā hante pravakṣyā śrutvā caivaṃ pracāraya | iha kaṣati śarīraṃ kleśarāśinarānāṃ dahati ca paralo[7r2 = 108r2]ke nārake krūravahniḥ | śaraṇagamanapuṇyaprāptiśikṣāpādānāṃ | prabhavati na tu dehe duḥkhadāhaka[7r3 = 108r3]dācit_ | tad yathābhūt samudrānte nādhogodhanābhidhāpurā | haṇāratnojjalokakalitā pūrvvavā¦[7r4 = 108r4]saraḥ | papatārhaniśaṃ tasya bhavane taptavālukā | yayāgeṣu bhūjaṃgānāṃ tīvratāpavyathābhavat_ || [7r5 = 108r5] kadācit sudhano nāma putraḥ papraccha taṃ priyaḥ | sukumāraḥ prakṛtyaiva vālukāparipīḍitaḥ | kasmād a[7r6 = 108r6]smān niyaṃtābhavādhake taptavālukā | mantramūlaprayogena keneyam upaśāmyati | artmadatyadhike

msItem.incipit: [1r1 = 116r1] athedāniṃ pravakṣyāmi tīrthāni dvādaśāni ca | śṛṇu maitreya puṇyāni [1r2 = 116r2] tīrthānāñ ca viśeṣataḥ || yatra nadīsusaṃbhedas tatra tīrthaḥ pracakṣate | vāgmatyāṃ keśāvatyāṃ [1r3 = 116r3] ca anyanadībhis saṃgame || amoghaphaladās aṃge vāgmatyāṃ puṇyatīrthakaḥ | daśākuśalahuha[1r4 = 116r4]tranāgo raktas takṣaka ca || māradārakayās aṃge vāgmatyāṃ śāntatīrthakaḥ | rāgādidoṣa[1r5 = 116r5]harttātra śuklo nāgaḥ somaśikhīḥ ||

supportDesc.support:
Nepalese multi-layered paper (verso sides are yellow-dyed).
12.6 26.7-27.9
supportDesc.foliation: Arabic numerals, top right margin, verso (reference foliation).

layout.p: 10-11 lines per page, approximately 30 to 39 akṣaras per line.
Double marginal writing framelines, impressed frame upper and lower frame lines; no ruling.

handNote.desc: Nepālākṣarā in black ink (slanted). Although the handwriting seems to be irregular, and the akṣaras often vary in size, the overall impression is that one single scribe was at work (probably working in different phases and with different writing tools).

physDesc.additions:
All marginal titles have been written on the page in a sort of ornamental position, diagonally to the short side.
Marginalia
Ratnamālāvadāna: running title for the collection (śrī avadānaratnamāleti), top left margin, verso; running title for the single avadānas (śrī kauśidyāvīryetyādi, śrī snātāvadāneti etc.), bottom left margin, verso.
Dvāviṃśatyavadānakathā: running title (dvāviṃśatidharmmaratnāvadāneti), top left margin, verso.
